import React,{useState} from 'react'; import AddIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Add'; import Axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import ListAltIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ListAlt'; import "./AddProducts.css"; const UpdateProducts = (props) => { const [pname, setPname] = useState(props.location.state.pName) const [pdesc, setPdesc] = useState(props.location.state.pDesc) const [pcat, setPcat] = useState(props.location.state.pCat) const [pprice, setPprice] = useState(props.location.state.pPrice) const [puom, setPuom] = useState(props.location.state.pUOM) const [ppic, setPpic] = useState(props.location.state.pPic) var onChangePname = event => { props.location.state.pName=event.target.value; setPname(event.target.value); } var onChangePdesc = event => { props.location.state.pDesc=event.target.value; setPdesc(event.target.value); } var onChangePcat = event => { props.location.state.pCat=event.target.value; setPcat(event.target.value); } var onChangePprice = event => { props.location.state.pDesc=event.target.value; setPprice(event.target.value); } var onChangePuom = event => { setPuom(event.target.value); } var onFileChange=(e)=>{ setPpic(e.target.files[0].name) console.log(e.target.files[0]) const data=new FormData() data.append('file',e.target.files[0]) console.log(data) Axios.post('http://localhost:3001/upload', data) } var onUpdate=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); Axios.post("http://localhost:3001/api/update-prod",{ pid:props.location.state.pId, pname:pname, pdesc:pdesc, pcat:pcat, pprice:pprice, puom:puom, ppic:e.target.files[0].name }) this.props.history.push('/view-prod'); alert("Product Updated !"); } return (
